title: The Enchanted Network
tagline: In a world where magic meets machine, the future of the forest is in their hands.
mpaa_rating_content: This film contains mild thematic elements and fantasy action, but no material likely to offend or harm.
critic_review: Gus Van Sant delivers a whimsical yet thought-provoking adventure in 'The Enchanted Network'. Joseph Fineapple and Andrew Garfish shine in a story that beautifully blends the mystical with the technological. With its G rating, the film is a perfect choice for families, offering a captivating narrative that will resonate with viewers of all ages. An enchanting journey through a forest where every tree tells a story and every circuit hides a secret, this film is a testament to the power of harmony between the natural and artificial worlds.
description: Set in the cyberpunk era within the Gloomy Enchanted Forest, 'The Enchanted Network' follows the unlikely alliance between the innovative CEO, Adrian Vandermere, and a wise fairy named Elaria. As political intrigue threatens the delicate balance between technology and nature, this duo must navigate a world of cutting-edge cybernetics and ancient magic to protect their home from the shadows of war. Directed by Gus Van Sant and introducing Joseph Fineapple alongside Andrew Garfish, this film is a family-friendly tale of bravery, strategy, and the power of unity.
prompt: Create a title, tagline, and Impartial description teaser of a MPAA G rated movie. Directed by award winning Gus Van Swant, the movie stars Joseph Fineapple in their debut role, supported by Andrew Garfish. Located at Forest (Gloomy/Enchanted) of a War Experimental film where Entrepreneur/CEO and Mythical Creature (Fairy/Elf/Dwarf/Giant/Mermaid/Dragon/Centaur) are the main characters. The movie is about a Political Intrigue during Cyberpunk Era. make the character names of European origin. Provide what the movie contains which is the reason for the rating. The title, tagline and description should be consistent with the rating of the movie. Provide a critic score between 1 and 10 as critic_score. Provide a critic review as critic_review. Output result as json, title as the title property, tagline as the tagline property, rating as mpaa_rating, rating reason as rating_content, assign it a single word genre as genre, description as the description property.
